ComicInfo.Title: The Haunting of Bluebeard!; Death and Tommy Norton; The Man Who Saw Tomorrow; The Twin!
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Haunting of Bluebeard!: A man who calls himself Bluebeard murders and robs the guests of his inn, but when a thief carrying a bottle of Nitro becomes his latest victim, Bluebeard decides to dispose of the bottle outside. When he returns to the inn, the ghosts of his former victims are now able to seize his body as he is unaware that what he took for lightning and thunder was the bottle exploding in his hand and he is now a ghost.
Death and Tommy Norton: A boy's toy soldier shoots his aunt when she attempts to murder him.
The Man Who Saw Tomorrow: A man who invents a camera that can photograph the future is terrified when he sets it to a week in advance and produces a...blank photo.
The Twin!: In eighteenth-century France, twin brothers are always competing with each other but the one who was born first always thinks of ideas slightly before the other. The later brother decides he's had enough and is going to murder the first born twin, but yet again, he gets the idea just a little slower than the other man.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Writer: Stan Lee,Paul S. Newman,Stan Lee,Paul S. Newman
ComicInfo.Penciller: Tony Di Preta,John Romita,Joe Sinnott,Myron Fass,Tony Di Preta,John Romita,Joe Sinnott,Myron Fass
